titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse on Sunday, the eight and twentieth day of Iune. 1629. By Richard Farmer, sometimes of Pembrooke-Hall in Cambridge, now parson of Charwelton in the county of Northampton
titleStmt.author: Farmer, Richard, d. 1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Iames Bovvler, dwelling at the signe of the Marigold in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Marigold in Pauls Churchyard
